profile:
Drainscope.net - Complete Drainage Solutions.  Perimeter drain tile technicians. We will Maintain, Clean, Repair & Replace your Drains, Sewer & Water lines services. Call Today for a free estimate. Proud Member of the BBB of Victoria with an A+ rating. Proud winner of the 2013 BBB Torch Award for Ethical Decision Making. We have 1000's of happy & very satisfied clients, visit our website for information and reviews.

DRAINSCOPE™ has built a solid reputation for solving the most demanding Drainage issues. Our professional drainage Technicians will tackle any problem any time of the year with surgical precision.

We have the all the specialized equipment & tools necessary to carry out any job large or small, doing it right the first time. All of our work is guaranteed for an appropriate time period so you can rest assured that you have made a solid investment by choosing DrainScope™. We are licensed, fully insured & Dedicated to Excellence. The technicians at DrainScope™ are here to help our Victoria, BC. customers.

services:
Our Services Include: Perimeter Maintenance, Drain-Tile Replacement, Drain Cleaning & Repairs, Perimeter & Rain Systems, Hydro-Jetting & Rootering, CCTV Camera Inspections, 
Trenchless Solutions, Pre-purchase Surveys, Sewer/Storm Laterals, Waterline Replacements, Utility/Pipe Locating, Curtain Drains, Catch Basins, Backflow Protection, Basement Waterproofing, Foundation Protection, Sumps & Backup Systems, Sewer Clean-out Installation, Mini Excavating & Bobcat, Concrete & Asphalt
specialities:
CCTV Camera inspections & complete assessments.
All Drainage system cleaning and renewals.
payment_method: All Major credit cards, Check & Cash
